name: Poll
author: bob
bobsCog
short: Create polls using reactions as the responses
description:
Create polls using reactions as the responses.

Dependencies: None
install_msg: Thanks for installing Poll. Please make sure your bot has the 'Manage Messages' permission so it can manage emoji reactions on messages.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord IDs as needed for operation temporary during a poll which are automatically deleted when it ends.
